Rulings.Base:
1. "Infernity Break" targets 1 'Infernity' card in your GY and 1 card your opponent controls.
2. "Infernity Break" will work even if you have 1 or more cards in your hand when it resolves.
3. Removing and destroying happen at the same time.
4. You still remove the card from your GY even if your opponent's card is no longer on the field.

PSCT.Base: If you have no cards in your hand: Target 1 "Infernity" card in your Graveyard and 1 card your opponent controls; banish the first target, and if you do, destroy the second target.
